name: One More Day (One More Day Team.)
name_original: One More Day (One More Day Team.)
description:
A traveler by the name of Manfri leaves his hometown of Temporisa in search of adventure. Upon returning many years later, he is met with a shocking discovery: the entire town is trapped in a time loop! He now must figure out how and why this is happening and put a stop to it.

An interactive mystery story with platformer elements and a blend of both 2d and 3d graphics. Find out the cause of the town's strife and save the day!
